parameters.query: SELECT a.id, a.tenant_id, a.client_final_id, a.invoice_id, a.numero_avoir, a.date_avoir, a.montant_ht, a.montant_ttc, a.tva_taux, a.motif, a.description, a.statut, a.lien_pdf, a.created_at, a.updated_at, cf.nom as client_nom, cf.prenom as client_prenom, cf.email as client_email, cf.telephone as client_telephone, cf.raison_sociale as client_raison_sociale, inv.numero_facture as invoice_numero FROM avoirs a LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON a.client_final_id = cf.id LEFT JOIN invoices inv ON a.invoice_id = inv.id WHERE a.id = $1 AND a.tenant_id = $2
SELECT id, avoir_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre FROM avoir_lines WHERE avoir_id = $1 ORDER BY ordre ASC

parameters.jsCode:
const avoirItem = $('05. Get Avoir').first().json;
const lines = $('06. Get Lines').all().map(item => item.json);

if (!avoirItem || !avoirItem.id) {
  return [{ json: { error: 'Avoir not found' } }];
}

const a = avoirItem;

const avoir = {
  id: a.id,
  tenant_id: a.tenant_id,
  client_final_id: a.client_final_id,
  invoice_id: a.invoice_id,
  invoiceId: a.invoice_id,
  numero_avoir: a.numero_avoir,
  numeroAvoir: a.numero_avoir,
  date_avoir: a.date_avoir,
  dateAvoir: a.date_avoir,
  montant_ht: a.montant_ht,
  montantHt: a.montant_ht,
  montant_ttc: a.montant_ttc,
  montantTtc: a.montant_ttc,
  tva_taux: a.tva_taux,
  tvaTaux: a.tva_taux,
  motif: a.motif,
  description: a.description,
  statut: a.statut,
  lien_pdf: a.lien_pdf,
  lienPdf: a.lien_pdf,
  created_at: a.created_at,
  createdAt: a.created_at,
  updated_at: a.updated_at,
  updatedAt: a.updated_at,
  clientFinal: a.client_final_id ? {
    id: a.client_final_id,
    nom: a.client_nom || null,
    prenom: a.client_prenom || null,
    email: a.client_email || null,
    telephone: a.client_telephone || null,
    raisonSociale: a.client_raison_sociale || null
  } : null,
  invoiceNumero: a.invoice_numero || null,
  lines: lines
};

return [{ json: avoir }];
